Image.Text:
Welcome to My Homepage

My name is Jayesh Kawli. I am gradute Student at Indiana University studying Computer Science.

I developed this website in the summer 2012. Right here you can get lot of information about me. My friends Education, Work experience to name a few. Don't forget to give your valuable feedback to my projects and this website

Image.Title: Design Seven
Image.Text:
Horseshoe Bend Coconino County, AZ

Horseshoe Bend site at Arizona - An awesome and equally scary experience to look over this terrifying cliff. Horseshoe Bend is the name for a horseshoe-shaped meander of the Colorado River located near the town of Page, Arizona, in the United States. Horseshoe Bend is located 5 miles (8.0 km) downstream from the Glen Canyon Dam and Lake Powell within Glen Canyon National Recreation Area, about 4 miles (6.4 km) southwest of Page.

Image.Title: Design Eight
Image.Text:
Antelope Canyon

Antelope Canyon is a slot canyon in the American Southwest.A long time ago, herds of pronghorn antelope roamed freely in Antelope Canyon, which explains the canyon's English name. It is not known exactly when people first discovered Antelope Canyon.
